Package com.knockk.api.data.service

Class ResidentDataService

java.lang.Object
com.knockk.api.data.service.ResidentDataService
@Service public class ResidentDataService extends Object
Service class for the residents data
Author:
graceradlund

  • Method Details

    • createAccount

      public UUID createAccount(UserEntity user) throws Exception
      Registers the user given their email and password
      Parameters:
      user - : username and password of the user
      Returns:
      an id of the user (if successfully registered)
      Throws:
      Exception - thrown if there is a problem creating the account, or if the email is already taken

    • checkNeighborFloor

      public boolean checkNeighborFloor(UUID buildingId, int floor)
      Checks to see if the building has a room above that the resident is neighbors with
      Parameters:
      buildingId - : id of the building the unit is in
      floor - : floor that is being checked (already has the +/- 1)
      Returns:
      a boolean if the neighbor has a neighboring floor

    • checkNeighborRoom

      public boolean checkNeighborRoom(UUID buildingId, int room)
      Checks to see if the unit has neighbors to the right or left
      Parameters:
      buildingId - : id of the building the unit is in
      room - : room that is being checked (already has the +/- 1)
      Returns:
      a boolean if the neighboring room exists

    • checkVerified

      public boolean checkVerified(UUID residentId) throws CredentialException
      Finds if the resident is verified. NOTE: does not use the repository because there is an error with the PGObject convertor... Have to use the convertor because some types in Supabase need to be converted (like jsonb)
      Parameters:
      residentId - : id of the resident
      Returns:
      a boolean if the resident is verified
      Throws:
      CredentialException - if there is a problem getting the resident

    • createFriendship

      public FriendshipEntity createFriendship(UUID invitorId, UUID inviteeId) throws Exception
      Creates a friendship.
      Parameters:
      invitorId - : id of the resident who sent the request.
      inviteeId - : id of the resident receiving the request.
      Returns:
      a friendship entity containing details about the friendship.
      Throws:
      Exception - thrown if there is a problem creating

    • checkConnected

      public boolean checkConnected(UUID residentId, UUID friendId)
      Checks to see if two residents are friends. NOTE: neighbors don't always have a friendship relationship.
      Parameters:
      residentId - : id of the resident (user)
      friendId - : id of the friend (neighbor)
      Returns:
      a boolean - true if connected, false if not connected or a friendship doesn't exist

    • createResident

      public boolean createResident(ResidentEntity resident) throws Exception
      Registers a resident in the database with the id created upon registering the email.
      Parameters:
      resident - : information about the resident (not including username and password)
      Returns:
      a boolean if successful
      Throws:
      Exception - thrown if there is an issue registering the unit

    • deleteFriendship

      public boolean deleteFriendship(UUID residentId, UUID friendId) throws Exception
      Deletes a friendship.
      Parameters:
      residentId - : id of the resident who no longer wants a friendship.
      friendId - : id of the resident who the resident no longer wants a friendship with.
      Returns:
      a boolean if the friendship has been successfully deleted.
      Throws:
      Exception - thrown if there is a problem deleting the friendship.

    • findBuilding

      public List<BuildingEntity> findBuilding(String street) throws Exception
      Retrieves a building by the street address TODO: probably shouldn't throw an exception if it's empty, only if the address is wrong
      Parameters:
      street - : street address of the building
      Returns:
      a list of building entities
      Throws:
      Exception - thrown if the list is empty

    • findFriendship

      public Optional<FriendshipEntity> findFriendship(UUID residentId, UUID friendId)
      Retrieves the friendship of two residents
      Parameters:
      residentId - : id of the resident (user)
      friendId - : if of the friend (neighbor)
      Returns:
      an optional friendship entity

    • findNeighborsByUnit

      public List<UUID> findNeighborsByUnit(int floor, int room)
      Retrieve a list of resident ids who live in a unit.
      Parameters:
      floor - : floor the unit is on
      room - : room the unit is in
      Returns:
      a list of ids

    • findUnitByUserId

      public UUID findUnitByUserId(UUID residentId) throws Exception
      Retrieves the id of the unit by the id of the resident
      Parameters:
      residentId - : id of the resident
      Returns:
      the id of the unit
      Throws:
      Exception - : if there is a problem getting the lease id (i.e. one may not exist)

    • findResidentByEmailAndPassword

      public UserEntity findResidentByEmailAndPassword(String email, String password) throws CredentialException
      Finds the id of the resident given their email and password. Uses the user repository.
      Parameters:
      email - : email of the resident
      password - : password of the resident
      Returns:
      the residents id if the credentials are valid
      Throws:
      CredentialException - if the credentials are not valid

      Parameters:
      residentId - : id of the resident
      Returns:
      a resident entity

    • findUnitById

      public UnitEntity findUnitById(UUID unitId)
      Retrieves a unit by the id of the unit
      Parameters:
      unitId - : id of the unit
      Returns:
      a UnitEntity

    • getBuildingIdByAddressAndName

      public UUID getBuildingIdByAddressAndName(String address, String name) throws Exception
      Retrieves a building id by the address and name of the building.
      Parameters:
      address - : street address of the building
      name - : name of the building
      Returns:
      the id of the building
      Throws:
      Exception - thrown if the building could not be found

    • getLeaseId

      public UUID getLeaseId(String address, String buildingName, int floor, int room, String startDate, String endDate) throws Exception
      Retrieves the id of a lease.
      Parameters:
      address - : building address of the lease
      buildingName - : building name on the lease
      floor - : floor number on the lease
      room - : room number on the lease
      startDate - : start date of the lease
      endDate - : end date of the lease
      Returns:
      the id of the lease
      Throws:
      Exception - thrown if the lease id can not be found

    • getResidentName

      public String getResidentName(UUID id, boolean isFullName)
      Retrieves the name of the resident. NOTE: isFullName will be true if a resident is connected or if it's the user resident retrieving their name.
      Parameters:
      id - : id of the resident
      isFullName - : boolean to see if the full name should be returned.
      Returns:
      the name of the resident

    • getProfilePhoto

      public String getProfilePhoto(UUID id)
      Retrieves the profile photo of the resident
      Parameters:
      id - : id of the resident
      Returns:
      the photo uri

    • getResidentEntity

      public ResidentEntity getResidentEntity(UUID id) throws NoSuchElementException
      Retrieves a resident. NOTE: does not use the repository because there is an error with the PGObject convertor... Have to use the convertor because some types in Supabase need to be converted (like jsonb)
      Parameters:
      id - : id of the resident
      Returns:
      a resident entity
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException

    • updateFriendship

      public FriendshipEntity updateFriendship(UUID invitorId, UUID inviteeId, boolean isAccepted) throws Exception
      Updates a friendship.
      Parameters:
      invitorId - : id of the resident who sent the request.
      inviteeId - : id of the resident receiving the request.
      isAccepted - : boolean if the resident who received the request has accepted the invite.
      Returns:
      a friendship entity containing details about the friendship.
      Throws:
      Exception - thrown if there is a problem retrieving or updating the friendship

    • updateResident

      public Boolean updateResident(ResidentEntity resident) throws Exception
      Updates a resident.
      Parameters:
      resident - : resident entity used to update the resident
      Returns:
      a boolean if the resident has been successfully updated
      Throws:
      Exception - if the resident could not be updated
